long_description: Step out of darkness and into the light with the Mammut T-Trail headlamp. From camping to hiking to nighttime climbing, the T-Trail does the job. 4 focused LEDs have excellent optical clarity to give you clear, bright light for medium-range lighting tasks; LEDs output 60 lumens and illuminate objects up to 30m away. Light up the night with 3 brightness levels (low, medium and high) and an emergency strobe. Strobe mode allows the light to blink 6 times per minute so that it can be left on as an emergency beacon. 3 AAA batteries (included) provide up to 80 hrs. of use on low and 20 hrs. on high; battery-life indicator lets you know when the batteries are running low. Double-click switch-lock prevents accidentally running down the batteries while the headlamp is stowed in your backpack. Weighing only 2.5 oz., the Mammut T-Trail headlamp is barely noticeable in your pack.
short_description: Step out of darkness and into the light with the Mammut T-Trail headlamp. From camping to hiking to nighttime climbing, the T-Trail does the job.
